source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenic, aerial shot of a vast, misty lake surrounded by mountains at either sunrise or sunset. The sun peeks over the mountain range, casting a warm, golden light and dramatic rays through the haze. Small, tree-covered islands dot the calm, reflective water, creating a serene and majestic atmosphere.

The camera slowly tilts upward, gradually revealing the full expanse of the mountain range and the glowing sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption:
This is a scenic, aerial shot of a vast, misty lake surrounded by mountains at either sunrise or sunset. The sun peeks over the mountain range, casting a warm, golden light and dramatic rays through the haze. Small, tree-covered islands dot the calm, reflective water, creating a serene and majestic atmosphere.

The camera slowly tilts upward, gradually revealing the full expanse of the mountain range and the glowing sky.

bad_caption: A herd of wild horses gallops across a wide, open desert plain, kicking up dust as they move in unison. In the background, a line of tall cacti stretches toward the horizon under a clear blue sky. The camera slowly pans to the right, following the horses as they approach a shallow river and begin to cross it, splashing water with their hooves.
